titleStmt.title: The temple of love A masque. Presented by the Queenes Majesty, and her ladies, at White-hall on Shrove-Tuesday, 1634. By Inigo Iones, surveyor of his Maties. workes, and William Davenant, her Maties. servant.
titleStmt.author: Jones, Inigo, 1573-1652.
D'Avenant, William, Sir, 1606-1668. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Walkley, and are to be sold at his shop neare White-hall,

notesStmt.note: B4 was intended to be cancelled, but persists in most copies.
Variant: title page in an earlier version, with "surveyour of his Majesties workes" and other differences.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
